indicator_name: Direct economic loss attributed to disasters in relation to global gross domestic product (GDP)
target_name: Bis 2030 die Widerstandsfähigkeit der Armen und der Menschen in prekären Situationen erhöhen und ihre Exposition und Anfälligkeit gegenüber klimabedingten Extremereignissen und anderen wirtschaftlichen, sozialen und ökologischen Schocks und Katastrophen verringern
un_designated_tier: Tier II
un_custodian_agency: United Nations Office for Disaster Risk Reduction (UNDRR)
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata
page_content:
Exploring data sources 
Suitable data sources for this indicator are currently being explored. This indicator is classified as Tier 3 and therefore no internationally established methodology or statistical standards are yet available. Corresponding methodologies or standards are being developed by the responsible international organizations and subsequently tested in cooperation with national statistical offices. If you have any feedback or suggestions on data please contact us through the contact form below.
target: By 2030, build the resilience of the poor and those in vulnerable situations and reduce their exposure and vulnerability to climate-related extreme events and other economic, social and environmental shocks and disasters
